      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lom.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:aspect.cup.cam.ac.uk:cahi1:data_688d8f2d43446e6ee878b8a963d7a8dcdc4dfac7</entry>
          </identifier>

            <catalog>CUP</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_688d8f2d43446e6ee878b8a963d7a8dcdc4dfac7</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Candle experiment</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kerzeexperiment</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Expérience de bougie</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Experiência da vela</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Esperimento della candela</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πείραμα κεριών</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Experimento de la vela</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows a candle burning in the presence of oxygen used as an exercise. When all the oxygen is used up, the candle goes out.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">burning</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">candle</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">going out</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">oxygen</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt eine Kerze, die in 
Anwesenheit des Sauerstoffes brennt, der als Übung benutzt wird. 
Wenn der ganzer Sauerstoff oben benutzt wird, erlischt die 
Kerze.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre une bougie brûlant en 
présence de l'oxygène utilisé comme exercice. Quand tout 
l'oxygène est épuisé, la bougie sort.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra uma vela que queima-se 
na presença do oxigênio usada como um exercício. Quando todo 
o oxigênio é usado acima, a vela sai.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra una candela che si 
brucia in presenza dell'ossigeno usato come esercitazione. 
Quando tutto l'ossigeno è consumato, la candela esce.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει ένα κερί που καίει 
παρουσία του οξυγόνου που χρησιμοποιείται ως άσκηση. Όταν 
όλο το οξυγόνο καταναλώνεται, το κερί βγαίνει.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra una vela que se quema 
en la presencia del oxígeno usada como ejercicio. Cuando todo 
el oxígeno se utiliza para arriba, la vela sale.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Brennen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kerze</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Erlöschen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sauerstoff</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">brûlure</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">bougie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">sortir</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">l'oxygène</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">queimadura</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">vela</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">sair</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">oxigênio</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">bruciarsi</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">candela</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">ossigeno</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">κερί</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          <keyword>

          <keyword>
